D

DataTag - Class in util
This class provides an easy way to represent and read pairs of data.
DataTag(String, String) - Constructor for class util.DataTag
A constructor for a DataTag which is used when one has two data elements that have String representations, but they are not yet combined into a DataTag.
DataTag(String) - Constructor for class util.DataTag
This constructor is used when one has a String representation of a DataTag and needs to turn it into a real DataTag, often to easily access the data stored in the String.
deleteLayers() - Method in class application.FractalEditor
Deletes all the layers from the Layer Editor menu and resets the layer index to 1
description - Static variable in class fractal.Layer
A description of the layer.
Display - Class in menus
This class contains a lot of the rendering code and logic code for the Network View.
Display(Server) - Constructor for class menus.Display
Creates the display and starts the thread
DISPLAY_HEIGHT - Static variable in class menus.Display
The height of the panel in pixels
DISPLAY_WIDTH - Static variable in class menus.Display
The width of the panel in pixels
displayAlert(String, String, String) - Static method in class menus.ExpandableMenu
The method that actually displays the expandable menu as an alert
displayColorMenus(ArrowButton<Color>, Window) - Static method in class application.GradientMenus
Used to display a menu for modifying the color of a color point
displayColorMenus(SquareButton, Window) - Static method in class application.GradientMenus
Used to display a menu for modifying the color of a color point
displayInformation(String, String, String) - Static method in class menus.ExpandableMenu
The method that actually displays the expandable menu as an information notification
displayLayerMenu(TreeItem<MetaLayer>) - Static method in class application.GradientMenus
Used to display the opacity editor that controls the opacity of a whole layer.
displayOpacityMenu(ArrowButton, Window) - Static method in class application.GradientMenus
Creates an opacity display menu and allows the user to edit the opacity data
draw(Graphics2D) - Method in class application.ArrowButton
Draws the arrow on the screen
draw(Graphics2D) - Method in class application.SquareButton
draws the button.
DynamicCompiler - Class in util
This class was copied from the location below and was created by david, the author of the article.
DynamicCompiler() - Constructor for class util.DynamicCompiler
 
DynamicCompiler.InMemoryJavaFileObject - Class in util
java File Object represents an in-memory java source file
so there is no need to put the source file on hard disk
DynamicCompiler.MyDiagnosticListener - Class in util
This class will print diagnostic information about any failed compilations.
